meta.name: description
meta.content: Floresville Independent School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Floresville, TX.

h3.a: Building Closures Extended Through End of 2020 School Year
Dr. Bays Google Meet for Parents

div.div: Click the headline to watch Dr. Bays discuss how the district is continuing to provide services during school closures due to COVID-19

img.alt: Covid-19 Updates Graphic

div.div: FISD is committed to developing 21st century graduates who are life‐long learners that are purposeful, innovative, collaborative, and possess character traits that lead to success.
